text:
A 30-year-old woman jumped into a well, along with her two daughters at Manjanayakahalli in Pennagaram on Thursday. The victim Kaliammal, a wage labourer, had jumped to her death, along with her two daughters – three-year-old Keerthika, and six-year-old Saranya.

The victim, wife of Shakthi, reportedly had a domestic tiff pushing her to take the extreme step. Manjanayakahalli police have registered a case.
title: Woman jumps into well with daughters
